segments.text: How are you feeling , champ ? Ready to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , if I can keep up my workouts , I think I have a chance in 2004 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In gymnastics . I'm pretty flexible . Look ! I can even touch my toes !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do back flips at the pool all the time .
segments.speaker: S2
